document.full_text: the world health organization believes the spread of radiation from a quake-crippled nuclear plant in japan remains limited and appears to pose no immediate risk to health, the who's china representative said on friday.
document.title: japan radiation localized, no immediate threat: who
lines_and_colors: the world health organization believes the spread of radiation from a quake-crippled nuclear plant in japan remains limited and appears to pose no immediate risk to health, the who's china representative said on friday.
